statements: SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date, energy_threshold FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, energy_threshold, start_date, end_date, program_id FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, energy_threshold FROM demand_response_programs WHERE energy_threshold > 100;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date, energy_threshold FROM demand_response_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, energy_threshold FROM demand_response_programs WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs WHERE energy_threshold > 500 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, energy_threshold FROM demand_response_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM demand_response_programs WHERE end_date IS NULL ORDER BY program_name DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_datetime, end_datetime FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM demand_response_programs WHERE target_energy_reduction > 0;
SELECT participant_id, energy_usage FROM participant_data ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT program_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM participant_data GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT program_name, start_datetime, end_datetime FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, target_energy_reduction FROM demand_response_programs WHERE target_energy_reduction > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM participant_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 AND response_status = 'active';
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS participant_count FROM demand_response_programs JOIN participant_data ON demand_response_programs.program_id = participant_data.program_id GROUP BY program_name;

SELECT program_id, program_name, energy_usage FROM participant_data JOIN demand_response_programs ON participant_data.program_id = demand_response_programs.program_id ORDER BY energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM DemandResponseProgram;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM DemandResponseProgram ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_time, end_time FROM DemandResponseProgram WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemands WHERE demand_kWh > 100 ORDER BY demand_kWh DESC;
SELECT schedule_name, peak_start_time, peak_end_time FROM PeakHourSchedule ORDER BY peak_start_time;
SELECT * FROM DemandResponseProgram ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM DemandResponseProgram WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM DemandResponseProgram WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time, demand_kWh FROM DemandResponseProgram JOIN CustomerDemands ON DemandResponseProgram.program_id = CustomerDemands.program_id;
SELECT schedule_name, peak_start_time, peak_end_time FROM PeakHourSchedule WHERE peak_end_time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM demand_response_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, usage_amount, usage_timestamp FROM participants JOIN energy_usage ON participants.participant_id = energy_usage.participant_id;
SELECT program_name, start_hour, end_hour FROM demand_response_programs JOIN peak_hours ON demand_response_programs.program_id = peak_hours.hour_id;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM demand_response_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, usage_amount, usage_timestamp FROM participants JOIN energy_usage ON participants.participant_id = energy_usage.participant_id WHERE usage_amount > 100;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM demand_response_programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM usage_timestamp) = 9 ORDER BY usage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_time, end_time FROM DemandResponsePrograms ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_type, device_location FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Meter';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM Devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Meter';
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM DemandResponsePrograms ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
